channel.title: Need Rsps Server Info
channel.description:
[b]I have a couple questions about making a Rsps.
1. How Much does it cost a month to keep a rsps online for people to go on? 2. Can you link a source and client for me to start with thats already ready to host. 3. How do I put a Rsps Online for others to play? 4. Can you leave steps for me to do to get the Rsps online?[/b]

item.title: Need Rsps Server Info
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

  1. You are better of buying a small sized VPS to start with, if you are wanting your server to be 24/7 without the chance of your computer burning out. A vps can cost from $5 onwards.

  2. Visit the Server Downloads section of the forums. It is filled with many sources and clients, with the exception of many new daily adds.

  3. There is a tutorial in the tutorials section of the forums. Here you can find out how to portforward, run your first server, and also to help you with snippets and other usefull things.

  4. Same as number 3.

Thanks, Demps2k9.

Read full topic

  4. Can you leave steps for me to do to get the Rsps online? - Iâ€™ll do it add my skype alex.ulin
